Vehicle.Name: Modular Hangar
Vehicle.Description:
[H3]HNG F-104 Modular Hangar[h3]
Similar in construction to the L-120 modular motor pool, the F-104 modular hangar provides ample space for starfighters or airspeeders and all of the equipment needed to maintain and repair these near-priceless military assets. When assembled, a modular hangar can hold starfighters or airspeeders with silhouettes that together total 12 or less. [P][I]Disclaimer: This is a piece of field equipment found in the Lead by Example Sourcebook. It is created as a stationary "vehicle" because it is the most appropriate format. While any mods or benefits are per the official source, the actual vehicle stats are an interpretation only and are not official. Feel free to modify them if you think any changes are required.[i]
Vehicle.StarFighters: Starfighters or airspeeders totaling up to silhouette 12
